#Installation

= Installation =

== Ubuntu Hardy ==

Download package from [http://code.google.com/p/ditz-commander/downloads/list Download page]

== Debian ===

Download package (with Ditz) from http://www.cgarbs.de/stuff/deb-repository.html#1

== Build from source ==

{{{
cd ditz-commander
dpkg-buildpackage -rfakeroot -us -uc
}}}
